column3: na m'Egya nye okuafo no."

column2: "Mo ho abaw biara a ɔnnsow aba no
column3: oyi no; na biara a ɔsow aba no
column4: oyiyi ho ma ɔaasow aba pii."

column2: "Hom ho atsew dada wɔ asɛm a maka akyerɛ hom no ntsi:"

column3: na mo so mentsena hom mu. Dɛ mbrɛ abaw nntum mmfi noara no mu nnsow aba
column4: gyedɛ ɔtsena wenyindua no mu no

column2: "Emi nye wenyindua no; hom nye abaw no: nyia ɔtse mo mu
column3: na metse no mu no
column4: ɔnoara na ɔsow aba pii; sɛ hom kwetsi me a

column3: wotwa no kyen dɛ abaw
column5: na wɔboaboa ano kogu gya mu

column3: na me nsɛm tsena hom mu a
column4: hom mbisa biribiara a hom pɛ

column3: dɛ hom sow aba pii

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ Egya no dɔ me no
column3: na mo so madɔ hom: hom ntsena mo dɔ mu."
hom bɛtsena mo dɔ mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ mo so mesie m'Egya ne mbransɛm na metsena no dɔ mu."

column2: "Maka yinom akyerɛ hom ama me dɛw aatsena hom mu
column3: na hom dɛw aahyɛ ma."
dɛ hom ndodɔ homho nkorkor

column2: "Obi nnyi dɔ a ɔso kyɛn iyi
column3: dɛ obi dze no nkwa bɔto hɔ ama n'anyɛnkofo."

column2: "Sɛ hom yɛ dza mehyɛ hom a
column3: hom yɛ m'anyɛnkofo."
osiandɛ akowaa nnyim dza no wura yɛ; na mafrɛ hom anyɛnkofo
column4: osiandɛ ndzɛmba a metsee no m'Egya hɔ nyina makyerɛ hom mu."

column2: "Nnyɛ hom bi na hom yii me
column3: na emi na miyii hom
column4: na medze hom sii hɔ dɛ hom nkɔ nkɔsow aba
column6: na biribiara a hom bɛserɛ Egya no wɔ me dzin mu no

column3: dɛ hom ndodɔ homho."
hom nyim dɛ ɔatan me ansaana ɔretan hom."
nkyɛ wiadze bɔdɔ nankasa nedze; na osiandɛ hom mmfi wiadze
column4: na miyii hom fii wiadze mu ntsi

column2: "Hom nkaa asɛm no a mesee hom no
column3: Akowaa nnkyɛn no wura. Sɛ wohiahiaa mo ho a
column4: wobehiahia hom so ho; sɛ wosiee m'asɛm a

column2: "Na yinom nyina me dzin ntsi na wɔdze bɛyɛ hom
column3: osiandɛ wonnyim nyia ɔsomaa me no."
nkyɛ wonnyi bɔn; na afei dze
ɔtan m'Egya so."

column2: "Sɛ mannyɛ wɔ hɔn mu ndwuma a obiara annyɛ bi da a
column3: nkyɛ wonnyi bɔn; na afei woehu na wɔatan emi nye m'Egya so."

column2: "Na iyi aba mu ma dza wɔakyerɛw no hɔn mbra mu no aahyɛ ma dɛ
column3: Wɔatan me kwa."

column2: "Na Okyigyinafo no a mibefi Egya no nkyɛn masoma no hom hɔ no
column3: nokwar Sunsum a ofir Egya no mu no
column5: ɔno na obedzi mo ho dase."

column3: osiandɛ hom fitsi ahyɛse ka mo ho."
